# thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_rtsp (Resource)

`thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_rtsp`: Configure RTSP ALG for NAT stateful firewall (default: enabled)

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_rtsp" "thunder_cgnv6_stateful_firewall_alg_rtsp" {
  rtsp_value = "disable"
  sampling_enable {
    counters1 = "all"
  }
}
```

- `rtsp_value` (String) 'disable': Disable ALG;
- `sampling_enable` (Block List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--sampling_enable))
- `uuid` (String) uuid of the object

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
